| HistoryText             = Seven legendary western gunfighters gathered together by the [[Jonathan Clay (Earth-616)|Rawhide Kid]] to rescue the brothers [[Wyatt Earp (Earth-616)|Wyatt]] and [[Morgan Earp (Earth-616)|Morgan Earp]] from [[Cristo Pike (Earth-616)|Cristo Pike]]. After successfully facing down Cristo and a septet of villainous counterparts, the Sensational Seven disbanded.{{r|Rawhide Kid Vol 4 1|4}}
